Name: Multris
About the game: A modified version of the classic puzzle game, but with a twist. Randomly generated polyominoes of varying shapes and sizes fall from the top of the screen. It is YOUR job to put them together! Controls: LEFT / RIGHT ARROW - Move. Hold to move quicker. DOWN ARROW - Soft Drop UP ARROW - Hard Drop SPACE - Hold current piece / Swap current piece with held piece Z - Rotate CCW X - Rotate CW C - Mirror piece over Y-Axis ENTER - Select/Pause ESCAPE - Exit the game if pressed in the menu More Possibilities! Hundreds of Different Pieces! play How You Want to!
